definitions: the suppression or prohibition of any parts of books, films, news, etc. that are considered obscene, politically unacceptable, or a threat to security

examples.text: the regulation imposes censorship on all media

shortDefinitions: suppression or prohibition of any parts of books, films, news, etc. considered obscene, politically unacceptable, or threat to security

definitions: (in ancient Rome) the office or position of censor

examples.text: he celebrated a triumph together with his father and they held the censorship jointly
